content:
An excellent choice! A good marinara sauce can elevate the entire dish. Here are some popular vegan marinara sauce options:

1. **Homemade Marinara Sauce**: Making your own marinara sauce from scratch is easy and only takes about 30 minutes. Simply sauté onions, garlic, and canned crushed tomatoes with some olive oil, salt, and your favorite herbs (like basil, oregano, or bay leaves).
2. **Rao's Homemade Marinara Sauce**: This is a popular, widely available, and highly-rated vegan marinara sauce brand. It's made with high-quality ingredients and has a rich, intense flavor.
3. **Muir Glen Organic Marinara Sauce**: Another well-known brand, Muir Glen offers a range of organic and vegan marinara sauces made with non-GMO ingredients and no added preservatives.
4. **Buitoni Vegan Marinara Sauce**: This is a convenient, store-bought option that's widely available and has a good balance of flavors.
5. **Victoria Fine Foods Marinara Sauce**: This brand offers a range of artisanal, vegan marinara sauces made with high-quality ingredients and no artificial preservatives.

When choosing a store-bought marinara sauce, make sure to check the ingredient list to ensure it's free from animal-derived products and by-products.

If you want to add an extra layer of flavor, you could also consider making a **cashew-based marinara sauce**. This involves blending cashews with lemon juice, garlic, and spices to create a creamy, cheesy-tasting sauce. There are many recipes available online if you're interested in trying this option.

Whichever marinara sauce you choose, I'm sure it'll complement your vegan lasagna and roasted vegetables nicely!
